richimage
open /manage_main
selectAndWait :action label=Plone Site
type siteid Site
addSelection extension_ids label=RichImage
clickAndWait submit
clickAndWait link=Site (Site)
clickAndWait //td[3]/font/a/span/strong
click //dl[@id='plone-contentmenu-factories']/dt/a/span[1]
clickAndWait richimage
type title Image 1
type image_file /tmp/img.jpg
clickAndWait form_submit
clickAndWait link=Edit
click //a[@id='fieldsetlegend-crops']/span
clickAndWait //img[@title='Edit']
click //body/div[5]
clickAndWait recrop
click //a[@id='fieldsetlegend-crops']/span
open /manage_main
click //input[@name='ids:list' and @value='Site']
click manage_delObjects:method
